snippet: The whistle-blower of the University of North Carolina sees a movement brewing in college sports.
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column commends whistle-blower Mary Willingham for her long effort to lay bare how the University of North Carolina and other schools admit student athletes who are not ready for college courses, and allow them to graduate without receiving an education; holds Willingham's work is an important part of movement to dismantle the power of the NCAA and athletic departments over how universities are managed.
lead_paragraph: The whistle-blower of the University of North Carolina sees a movement brewing in college sports.

headline.main: She Had to Tell What She Knew
headline.print_headline: She Had to Tell What She Knew
